definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, most notably associated with David Moyes, a professional football manager and former player.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的姓氏，最著名的是与职业足球教练兼前球员大卫·莫耶斯（David Moyes）相关。
definitions.example_en: David Moyes was appointed manager of Manchester United after Sir Alex Ferguson retired.
definitions.example_cn: 亚历克斯·弗格森爵士退休后，大卫·莫耶斯被任命为曼联主教练。
